channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Ultimate Carousel For WPBakery Page Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Ultimate Carousel For WPBakery Page Builder

item.title: CVE-2023-0267|2024-08-02T05:02:44.111Z -- unknown -- ultimate%20carousel%20for%20wpbakery%20page%20builder
item.description: The Ultimate Carousel For WPBakery Page Builder WordPress plugin through 2.6 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
